actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to modify the Keystone Reservoir project on the Arkansas River in order to provide that previous owners be given a priority in the leasing of lands acquired for such project.

summary.text: Modifies the Keystone Reservoir project on the Arkansas River in order to provide that previous owners of the land acquired for such project be given a priority in the leasing of such land.

titles.title: A bill to modify the Keystone Reservoir project on the Arkansas River in order to provide that previous owners be given a priority in the leasing of lands acquired for such project.
